title: Ranked 5's Competitive Team Looking for Players!
body:
▬▬ι═══════ﺤINSERT TEAM NAME HERE  -═══════ι▬▬


I've been looking to create a competitive LoL team with the hopes of improving individual + team skills, participating in tournaments, and just climbing the ranked ladder as far as possible as a strong team.Once the roster is finalized, a schedule will be created accordingly to accommodate everyone's IRL schedules. I'll go more in-depth with details with the finalized team about this but I expect all players to attend practises on time.
due to people not reading before messaging when you message me type lets win in my pm


▬▬ι═══════ﺤ POSITIONS -═══════ι▬▬

Coach - N/A
Analyst - N/A
Team Captain - Smashed wings (subject to change)
Shot caller (smashed wings) (subject to change)
Subs - Open
Top Laner - Open
Mid Laner - Frosted Stars
ADC - Smashed wings
Support - Open


▬▬ι═══════ﺤ REQUIREMENTS -═══════ι▬▬


Gold+ SoloQ Ranking (Exceptions to this may be given depending on a number of factors)
Positive Attitude & Mindset
Must be mature
Computer capable of running League of Legends smoothly
Some form of communication program such as Teamspeak (We'll find a universal one that everyone has access too)
Be able to be present for scheduled times (Schedule will be made once we have a full roster + everything settled)




▬▬ι═══════ﺤ APPLICATION FORMAT -═══════ι▬▬

(Don't forget to add me on LoL (smashed wings) once you've posted your application for further screening. Applicants that make it past the first screening will be put onto a temporary team and will under go even more screening via in game before finally being put into the final team.)

IGN :
Age :
Timezone : 
SoloQ Rank :
Position you're applying for :
Main Role : 
Champion pool (In order from best to worst) :
Any past experience playing in tournaments? (Not limited to League only, if yes please elaborate) :
Strengths :
Weaknesses :
Why do you want to be a part of this team :

replies.body:
GN : davrox
Age : 18
Timezone : eastern time 
SoloQ Rank : gold 
Position you're applying for : jungle/top
Main Role : adc and jungle/top
Champion pool (In order from best to worst) : j4,zed,darius,maokai,gnar,vi,udyr,jinx,corki,cait,my worst champion is nami :P
Any past experience playing in tournaments? (Not limited to League only, if yes please elaborate) : mgg tournaments win it one time and got many participation got 3e place and 4 e place 
Strengths : protect my jungle early gank take objectif, knowing enemy's ability
Weaknesses : getting cut, getting invaded
Why do you want to be a part of this team : i want to learn and improve my play.

IGN : Nookie Monster

Age : 22

Timezone : Eastern

SoloQ Rank : fluctuates between Gold IV and I

Position you're applying for : Top/ sub

Main Role : Top/adc

Champion pool (In order from best to worst) : {{champion:126}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:268}} 
Any past experience playing in tournaments? (Not limited to League only, if yes please elaborate) : None

Strengths : Dueling and taking objectives

Weaknesses : Diving too deep

Why do you want to be a part of this team : Something to do in my time off.  I'm not always available since I'm in the Navy, I've been playing for a long time and I'm good at calling the shots.  Willing to switch to any role for the team.

Any past experience playing in tournaments? (Not limited to League only, if yes please elaborate) :No I have not played in tournaments before.
Strengths :Great game knowledge, Been playing since season 1, Vision control
Weaknesses :Communication,shy.
Why do you want to be a part of this team :I want a team where we can improve as a team and work our way into the next level and get into the competitive scene.

IGN : Shiekk
Age : 22
Timezone : EST
SoloQ Rank : plat 5
Position you're applying for : jungler or fill
Main Role : Mid > Jungle > top > bot
Champion pool (In order from best to worst) : doing junglers: Shyvanna, Vi, Amu, Elise, Gragas, J4(I'm not actually bad at j4, i just dont like to play him too much)
Any past experience playing in tournaments? (Not limited to League only, if yes please elaborate) : Ya got third in some random tourney, won 10$RP(50 for team)
Strengths : Map awareness, Good champion pool, 
Weaknesses : Map awareness when Im tired, not flawless mechanics
Why do you want to be a part of this team : I'd like to play jungle on a ranked team, I think its much better to jungle when everyone is communicating, warding, etc, makes jungleing more exciting and the possibility for more interesting plays and stuff

Timezone : Mountain

Any past experience playing in tournaments? I mostly play by myself but id like to change that. So no real tournament exp.  :
Strengths : Great game knowledge, been playing since beta, good listener, communicative w/ pings, knows when to push the advantage and when to gtfo
Weaknesses : shy, sometimes trying to save teammates in hopeless situations
Why do you want to be a part of this team : Looking to get some ranked team games under my belt and see what its like.
